text: Isaac Morrison (born 1745) was a captain during the Revolutionary War, in the 1st New Jersey Regiment.https://familysearch.org/photos/artifacts/2222199 He served under Matthias Ogden and testified at his court martial.https://founders.archives.gov/documents/Washington/03-19-02-0257 ==References== Category:1745 births Category:People from Somerset County, New Jersey Category:Continental Army officers from New Jersey Category:Year of death missing
title: Isaac Morrison
